Producer: Eric England, Eric B. Fleischman, Sean Tabibian
Rating: R (Language Throughout|Bloody Violence|Drug Use|Brief Sexual Content/Nudity)
Synopsis: A wealthy young man is conned into staging a fake kidnapping, allowing him to be seen as a hero and win the affection of a girl he's madly in love with. But when one of the hired kidnappers is accidentally killed during the charade, he's forced to save her life while not revealing that it's been a ruse all along.
Title: Get the Girl
